definition: to involve/to implicate/to be interrelated
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey
unclear/ambiguous/having an unclear relationship with

sentences.english: Large cysts can cause backaches and a dragging sensation.
sentences.chinese: 體積較大的囊腫可引起背痛及牽扯感。

sentences.english: I think it's easy to get sucked into one of the chains.
sentences.chinese: 我想很容易就牽扯上其中的一家連鎖店了。

sentences.english: The serialization case is a bit more problematic.
sentences.chinese: 序列化所牽扯的問題要多一些。

sentences.english: The tension of the spring is caused by the weight.
sentences.chinese: 此彈簧的牽扯力是由重力引起的。

sentences.english: Or a whole bunch of something elses?
sentences.chinese: 或者牽扯別的一大堆事吧？

sentences.english: The mood is difficult to be as involved as a meal drink a draught people quiet pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 情緒就難被牽扯着了飯照喫水照喝樂的一個人清靜。

sentences.english: You don't seem to realize that there's much more involved.
sentences.chinese: 你似乎沒察覺，這裏邊牽扯很多問題。

sentences.english: He cursed himself again for getting involved, but it was toolate to walk away now.
sentences.chinese: 他咒自己又牽扯進去了，但是現在走開就太遲了。

sentences.english: I don't wish to be yoked to him in marriage, as if we were cattle pulling a plow.
sentences.chinese: 我並不希望象拉犁的牛一樣由於婚姻和他牽扯在一起。

sentences.english: There's always a lot riding on it for obvious reasons.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，德比戰總是牽扯到很多。

sentences.english: There are many big things involved in this.
sentences.chinese: 這裏面牽扯許多大問題。

sentences.english: I'm not getting involved in your personal vendettas .
sentences.chinese: 我沒有牽扯到你們的私人恩怨裏。

sentences.english: The outlook for inflation is also subject to a number of crosscurrents.
sentences.chinese: 對於通膨的前景也牽扯到一些相互對立的趨勢。

sentences.english: Don't involve other people in your trouble.
sentences.chinese: 別把他人牽扯進你的費事中去。

sentences.english: Concerning'the Nu of day absolute being'that miraculous precious stone, lead long to pull very extensively.
sentences.chinese: 關於‘日神之怒’那顆神奇的寶石，牽扯非常廣泛。

sentences.english: Even in Europe, business-as-usual can include illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在歐洲，即便是普通的生意也會牽扯到非法活動。

to be in a tangle/to nag
hostile/enemy (factions)/combative
